name: Urugthur
description:
My first web game. Made in a few hours.

You control an archer defending his home.

In order to survive you'll use your bow with different types of arrows.

How to play:

- Mouse left click: Shoot

- 1-2-3 Swap arrow type

- TEXT (HEALTH, ARROWS LEFT, KILLS)

Tips:

Arrows have a limit (but they recharge over time).

Thanks:

allegro.js : http://allegrojs.net
